That spread poison into the world.
Many people are harmed by them.
It's a shame he didn't meet Shaoshi earlier.
This is something that can be disparaged.
It's irreproachable.
They crossed the sea and came from across the Han River.
They've flatly deceived the Eastern Land.
He might have kowtowed his head in compassion.
That's because he's wrong, even more so than King Liang.
Is that praiseworthy?
Is it not praiseworthy?

source_sentence: 為上禪人題送行軸之仰山鐘阜
translation: For the superior Chan master, he titled the departing shaft of Yangshan Zhongfu.
At the present time, the path of the Dharma is fragmented.
The teaching of the master is weak.
Everyone pushes Gijun Zhongfu.
It's a unique step along the Grand River.
The Chan ascetic paid homage with single-minded reverence.
He still asked the old man for permission.
That's why he said.
"One person spreads their claws into an eagle's nest.
One person crosses their body on the edge of a hawk's nest.
If he gets close to them, his bile will fail and his soul will perish.
If they try to get close to them, their heads will split open and their foreheads will split open.
If you want to get close to them, you must untie their nests and deflect their claws.
You must unselect their nests and look into them.
You mustn't let him enter or make a point.
Otherwise, don't let it happen.
Don't let them litter the ground with skulls.
Record of Words of the Monk Jiebian (End)
